import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../../interfaces/user'; import { Resume } from '../../interfaces/resume'; @Component({ selector: 'appResume', templateUrl: './resume.component.html', styleUrls: ['./resume.component.scss'] }) export class ResumeComponent implements OnInit { @Input() resume: Resume; constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { } }
